items.title: Sequence 9: Reader
items.text:
New Abilities

Enhanced Mental Attributes: Upon drinking the potion, Readers will possess great improvements to their reasoning and learning capabilities along with their memory.
Spirituality: They gain an enhanced Spirituality upon drinking this potion.
Divination Arts & Ritualistic Magic: As a result of their enhanced Spirituality, Readers will be capable of using various Ritualistic Magic and Divination Arts.

items.title: Sequence 8: Student of Ratiocination
items.text:
Strengthened Abilities

Enhanced Mental Attributes: They gain an increase in observational and logical reasoning skills.
If they have enough knowledge and understanding, they can observe and deduce logic for that subject, whether possible or actual. For example, they may determine many reasons why someone refuses to do something or why something does not work.
A Student of Ratiocination could use all their senses to be mindful and aware as much as possible of their environment, looking at, gathering, and recalling their surroundings in great detail, further enhancing their ability to deduce a situation.
Spirituality: A further enhancement to their Spirituality has been gained at this level
Divination Arts & Ritualistic Magic: As a result of this, a Student of Ratiocination will become an expert at Ritualistic Magic and Divination Arts.

items.title: Sequence 7: Detective (Knowledge Keeper)
items.text:
New Abilities

Physical Enhancements: A Detective possesses an enhanced mobility and speed.
Combat Proficiency: They possess strong equipment and fighting capabilities.
They are proficient in utilizing weapons and various equipment to fight, as well as possess decent quarter combat capabilities, making them a  "fighting master"
Strengthened Abilities

Enhanced Mental Attributes: They are good at using pre-established knowledge, deducing clues, observation details, and reasoning out various conclusions.
They can reconstruct past events within a certain area through mystical traces
This makes a Detective an expert at solving various problems and cases.
A Detective can be said to be a sort of "reasoning master".
Spirituality: With a further strengthening to their Spirituality comes along other changes, such as becoming more efficient at using Ritualistic Magic.
At this Sequence, they can be said to be Ritualistic Magic "masters".

items.title: Sequence 6: Polymath
items.text:
New Abilities

Analysis: Polymaths can Analyze the different characteristics of a Beyonder power used by the target.
The more comprehensive their knowledge and the deeper their understanding of the target's Pathway and Beyonder powers, the more effective their Analysis becomes.
The prerequisite for a Polymath's Analysis to work successfully is to have enough pre-existing knowledge of the target's Pathway and subsequent Beyonder powers.
Analysis let's them rapidly identify a target's Beyonder powers, allowing them to know of the target's strengths and weaknesses as well as Imitate more quickly.
Despite having only directly confronted Jason Beria once, Isengard Stanton was able to use 2-081 to Imitate and utilize the Beyonder power Danger  Premonition.
They can Analyze Fate-related abilities.
Imitation: Once sufficiently Analyzed, they can try to Imitate the corresponding Beyonder power.
The more effective their Analysis is, the higher the probability that their Imitation succeeds. However, the higher the Sequence of the Beyonder power, the higher that chances of failure.
Even if a Polymath manages to Imitate a Beyonder power of the same Sequence level as them, the power they Imitate will always be inferior to the original.
Edwina Edwards failed in her search for messengers partly because the Imitation of undead powers weren't enough to sign a Contract.
They can Imitate passive Beyonder powers such as a Devil's Danger Premonition, although this requires the active use of Imitation for normally passive abilities to show effects.
They can Imitate even powers like Recording, but it requires a lot of knowledge.
Polymaths are also able to Imitate Fate-related Beyonder abilities.
Depending on the potion digestion as well as the Polymath's knowledge mastery, a Polymath's Imitated power will be around 50-60% of the original power's strength.
Strengthened Abilities

Enhanced Mental Attributes: They can understand and comprehend many things.
A Polymath will also become massively gifted in learning and mastering a variety of fields, making them a Jack-of-all-trades due to being erudite.

items.title: Sequence 5: Mysticism Magister
items.text:
New Abilities

Spellcasting: A Mysticism Magister's mastery over rare and unique arcana not only enables them to cast Spells but also invent and create their own Spells that belong only to themselves.
Mysticism Magisters can achieve the effect of being well-rounded with this ability.
Some of the Spells and techniques they can use include but are not limited to:
Mirror Curse: Edwina Edwards used a bizarre but powerful spell that uses a brass mirror to reflect Ulyssan's body parts, pinching the reflection at the mirror’s surface before pulling outward, causing Ulyssan's wound to instantly worsen.
Sealing: Lucca Brewster mastered many strange but effective mystic arts as a Mysticism Magister, allowing him to Seal himself to a certain extent at the critical moment after becoming a Mythical Creature.
Strengthened Abilities

A Mysticism Magister's ability to Imitate and Analyze have been greatly enhanced.
Analyze: Mysticism Magisters are now able to Analyze the characteristics of a Demigod-level Beyonder power and attempt to copy it with Imitation.
Imitation: Their Imitated abilities have been enhanced with an Imitated Demigod-level power being only a bit weaker than a Scribe's Recording.
The chances of successfully Imitating a Demigod-level power is very low, and they must fully master the knowledge of the corresponding power to reach its maximum level.

items.title: Sequence 4: Prophet
items.text:
New Abilities

Prophecy: A Prophet has begun to master higher-level occult knowledge of a rather high level, especially in the Fate Domain, thereby gaining the ability to "Prophesize". 
Lucca Brewster Prophesied that he will be in a difficult circumstance in the future, and that one of the people he meets in the next few days (Gehrman Sparrow) will help him deal with that situation.
Demigod-level Officials of the Church of the God of Knowledge and Wisdom Prophesied that Lumian would appear in the City of Lenburg, thus allowing them to make arrests in advance.
Strengthened Abilities 

Spellcasting: Their ability to create Spells has improved significantly.
A Prophet is now able to utilize Analyze and Imitation, along with their other Beyonder powers, to quickly decipher certain restraints or powers and develop mystical techniques to counter them. 
Lucca Brewster who was trapped underground, focused his attention on deciphering the secrets hidden within a Seal and used those secrets to invent Spells for his situation
Mythical Creature Form

Observation: They can discern Beyonders from ordinary people.
As Sequence 4 Demigods they receive some level of Godhood, which they can use to transform into an incomplete Mythical Creature Form that consists of Illusory Bookshelves.

items.title: Sequence 3: Cognizer
items.text:
New Abilities

Cognize: They possess insight into the rules and laws of the world, granting them deep understanding and mastery over countless high-level mysticism and arcana.
Enemies standing in front of a Cognizer can rarely hide any secret. Everything, be it their strengths, weakness, or anything else is all laid bare for the Cognizer to see.
They can use their deep insight to see through and Analyze certain symbols and use it to create Spells through a process of Imitation.
For example, Cognizers can look and peer into the symbols of Lumian's Dream and derive certain Spells based off the symbols they have comprehended.
Fulcrum: Since they have mastered the Fulcrum in which they are able to place their own knowledge to move the world and in turn move their targets.
Through the use of the Fulcrum, Cognizers can often solve problems and challenges very easily.
Mythical Creature Form

As Sequence 3 Beyonders, they can now respond to prayers within a certain range.

items.title: Sequence 2: Wisdom Angel
items.text:
Authorities

Wisdom: When "They" have to make a decision, "They" will always make the Wisest and correct choice due to "Their" nature and ability to accurately foresee shifts in situations.
Combined with their abilities as Prophets and Cognizers, after Cognizing all of "Their" enemies' abilities and secrets and Prophesying the future, "They" are very hard to kill or to deal with.
The Demoness of Gold did not return to the Mirror World or face Xio or Derrick. As the wielder of the Eye of God, she was able to always foresee shifts within a situation and make right choices at the right time, thus allowing her to evade many disasters that fell in others' way.
Mythical Creature Form

"Their" Mythical Creature Form is now complete; it is that of countless Illusory Bookshelves. Within different places of the Illusory Bookshelves, there are pools of black shadows liquid that lay within.

items.title: Sequence 1: Omniscient Eye
items.text:
Authorities

Omniscience: "They" are able to see the information about anyone and anything, regardless of whether it pertains to knowledge about a target's past, present, or future. The respective scope of this Omniscience is the monitoring of Information.
Omniscience can be activated on targets and situations that are nowhere near "Them", enabling "Them" to still be able peer into a target's past, present, or future information.
Arrodes, despite being nowhere near the Astral World, was able to hear a voice coming from deep within Tenebrous Heaven that shouted the Sanguine  Ancestor's name.
Even if "They" can see the future information, if the target is strongly Concealed or of similar level, the most "They" would be able to see is vague revelations.
The God of Knowledge and Wisdom had seen via Omniscience that Lumian Lee would gain something rather unique, but "He" didn't know what that 'thing' would be.
"They" are able to instantly see all the information about the state, weaknesses, and the exploitable vulnerabilities of any target.
When "They" detect an exploitable problem, "They" could see how to exploit it with the most appropriate way, and see how exploiting it would be manifested.
Cheek used Omniscience authority to know every information about Amon's state, and weaknesses, searching for vulnerabilities to exploit, which she found quickly.
Lumian Lee, using Omniscience authority, was able to instantly detect the exploitable problems and ways to worsen it within the Malevolent Dragon.

items.title: Sequence 0: White Tower
items.text:
Authorities

Omniscience: At this level, the scope of "Their" Omniscience is Knowledge.
Strengthened Abilities

Spellcasting: At this level, They can "open source" "Their" Spells to be used by ordinary people, albeit it won't be very strong and has some requirements.
These Spells require materials, incantations, Spirit World resonance, Spirituality absorption, etc.
